name: ejector
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
a device or control that causes something to be pushed, thrown, or forced out of a place: The helicopter has rocket launchers, smoke ejectors, machine guns, heat-seeking missiles and flame throwers. an ejector button/knob/lever See also
ejection seatRelated word
eject
More examplesFewer examplesBehind the bombproof doors are control rooms, sleeping quarters, decontamination rooms and sewage ejectors.Available with up to three ejectors, the jet aerator is a flexible aeration solution for small and medium-sized tanks. Steam ejector systems are used in a wide range of industrial applications.The ejector mechanism is activated by a lever inside the car.The toast stays warm inside its slot until the operator presses the ejector lever. Carefully insert the card into the slot until the ejector button pops out toward you.
